author: tareci

review: This item was a gift from my daughter who already has the unit in her home.  It was easy to install, and I had a small issue about turning the unit on after shutting it down from the previous use.  The Amazon tech staff  called me within a matter of hours after requesting help.  It turned out to be "operator error" on my part.  The system now functions as it should and we will be buying a second unit.  The only problem with the second unit will be whether my wife puts it in her study or I put it in my classic car garage;  I may be buying two more units.  Thanx.
author: Jim

review: The Amazon Fire TV is quite a good choice for streaming box!  The interface is nicely laid out and easy to use.  Prime instant video is included by default and is a great addition to your media streaming choices.  Voice search is good, but does not seem to be integrated down into apps yet as it is on the Google Nexus Player.  Good hardware, great form factor, all in all, very nice.
author: Amazon Customer

review: It's not a bad product. My family and I were going to try to go cable free and looking at all of our options and we just aren't ready for it. We may explore the Amazon Fire TV in the future just not now.
author: Tim Donahue
